tool_description: FOAAS (Fuck Off As A Service) provides a modern, RESTful, scalable solution to the common problem of telling people to fuck off.
name: FOAAS
title: FOAAS

api_list.name: Fuck Off
api_list.description: Will return content of the form 'Fuck off, :name. - :from', e.g. /off/Tom/Chris will return 'Fuck off, Tom - Chris'
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mashape-community-foaas.p.rapidapi.com/off/Tom/Chris"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mashape-community-foaas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mashape-community-foaas.p.rapidapi.com/off/{name}/{is_from}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mashape-community-foaas.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
